description.zh-cn: 位于斯堪的纳维亚半岛的北欧国家，首都为斯德哥尔摩。
description.en: A Nordic country on the Scandinavian Peninsula, with its capital in Stockholm.

description.zh-cn: 现任瑞典国王。
description.en: The current King of Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典首相。
description.en: Prime Minister of Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典议会议长。
description.en: Speaker of the Riksdag.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典的国家立法机构。
description.en: The national legislature of Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于欧洲的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: A political and economic union of member states that are located primarily in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 一个实现欧洲和北美国家间集体防御的政府间军事联盟。
description.en: An intergovernmental military alliance between countries from Europe and North America, implementing a system of collective defence.

description.zh-cn: 1397年至1523年间由丹麦、瑞典（包括芬兰）和挪威（包括冰岛、格陵兰、法罗群岛和设得兰）组成的共主邦联。
description.en: A personal union in Scandinavia, agreed at Kalmar in Sweden, that from 1397 to 1523 joined under a single monarch the three kingdoms of Denmark, Sweden (then including Finland), and Norway (then including Iceland, Greenland, the Faroe Islands and Shetland).

en: United Kingdoms of Sweden and Norway

description.zh-cn: 1814年至1905年间瑞典和挪威组成的共主邦联。
description.en: A personal union of the separate kingdoms of Sweden and Norway under a common monarch and common foreign policy from 1814 to 1905.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典国王，领导瑞典脱离卡尔马联合。
description.en: King of Sweden, who led the Swedish secession from the Kalmar Union.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪初，瑞典与俄罗斯等国之间的一场战争，导致瑞典丧失欧洲强国地位。
description.en: A conflict in the early 18th century between Sweden and a coalition led by Russia, which resulted in Sweden losing its status as a great power in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 1721年至1917年间存在的一个历史国家，在大北方战争后取代瑞典成为欧洲强国。
description.en: A historical state that existed from 1721 until 1917, which replaced Sweden as a European great power after the Great Northern War.

description.zh-cn: 1809年瑞典与俄罗斯帝国之间的战争，导致瑞典将芬兰割让给俄国。
description.en: A war in 1809 between Sweden and the Russian Empire, which resulted in Sweden ceding Finland to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑战争后签订的条约，丹麦将挪威割让给瑞典。
description.en: A treaty signed after the Napoleonic Wars, under which Denmark ceded Norway to Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年间由阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治的德国。
description.en: Germany between 1933 and 1945, when Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party controlled the country.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，瑞典在战争中保持中立。
description.en: A global military conflict during which Sweden remained neutral.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典国王，收养了法国元帅贝尔纳多特为养子。
description.en: King of Sweden who adopted the French Marshal Bernadotte as his son.

description.zh-cn: 原法国元帅，后成为瑞典国王。
description.en: Former French Marshal who later became King of Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪欧洲的一场大规模战争，瑞典在其中扮演了重要角色并扩张了领土。
description.en: A major European conflict in the 17th century, in which Sweden played a significant role and expanded its territory.

description.zh-cn: 与瑞典东北接壤的北欧国家。
description.en: A Nordic country bordering Sweden to the northeast.

description.zh-cn: 与瑞典隔海相望并由厄勒海峡大桥连接的北欧国家。
description.en: A Nordic country across the sea from Sweden, connected by the Öresund Bridge.

description.zh-cn: 与瑞典西部接壤的北欧国家。
description.en: A Nordic country bordering Sweden to the west.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔十六世·古斯塔夫是现任瑞典国王。
description.en: Carl XVI Gustaf is the current King of Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 乌尔夫·克里斯特松是瑞典的现任首相。
description.en: Ulf Kristersson is the current Prime Minister of Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 安德烈亚斯·诺伦是瑞典议会的议长。
description.en: Andreas Norlén is the Speaker of the Riksdag.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典于1995年1月1日加入欧洲联盟。
description.en: Sweden joined the European Union on January 1, 1995.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典于2024年3月7日正式加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Sweden officially joined the North Atlantic Treaty Organization on March 7, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典是卡尔马联合的成员国之一，该联合还包括丹麦和挪威。
description.en: Sweden was one of the member states of the Kalmar Union, which also included Denmark and Norway.

description.zh-cn: 丹麦是卡尔马联合的成员国之一。
description.en: Denmark was one of the member states of the Kalmar Union.

description.zh-cn: 挪威是卡尔马联合的成员国之一。
description.en: Norway was one of the member states of the Kalmar Union.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典与挪威组成由瑞典主导的瑞典-挪威联合王国。
description.en: Sweden and Norway formed the United Kingdoms of Sweden and Norway, led by Sweden.

description.zh-cn: 根据基尔条约，挪威被割让给瑞典，两国组成瑞典-挪威联合王国。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Kiel, Norway was ceded to Sweden, and the two countries formed the United Kingdoms of Sweden and Norway.

description.zh-cn: 1521年，瑞典国王古斯塔夫一世再次建立王权，领导瑞典从卡尔马联合中独立。
description.en: In 1521, King Gustav I of Sweden re-established royal power and led Sweden's independence from the Kalmar Union.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典在大北方战争中战败，被俄罗斯帝国取代其在欧洲的强国地位。
description.en: Sweden was defeated in the Great Northern War and was replaced by the Russian Empire as a great power in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 1809年芬兰战争中瑞典战败，被迫将芬兰割让给俄国。
description.en: In the Finnish War of 1809, Sweden was defeated and forced to cede Finland to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑战争结束后，根据基尔条约丹麦将挪威割予瑞典，促成了瑞典-挪威联合王国的建立。
description.en: After the Napoleonic Wars, Denmark ceded Norway to Sweden according to the Treaty of Kiel, which led to the formation of the United Kingdoms of Sweden and Norway.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，瑞典在纳粹德国占领挪威后，给予德国军事通行权以及铁矿资源。
description.en: During World War II, after Nazi Germany occupied Norway, Sweden granted Germany military passage rights and provided iron ore resources.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典是1912年夏季奥林匹克运动会的主办国。
description.en: Sweden was the host country for the 1912 Summer Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典是1958年世界杯足球赛的主办国。
description.en: Sweden was the host country for the 1958 FIFA World Cup.

description.zh-cn: 1810年，卡尔十三世收法国元帅伯纳多特（即后来的卡尔十四世·约翰）为养子。
description.en: In 1810, Charles XIII adopted French Marshal Bernadotte (later Charles XIV John) as his son.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪时瑞典在三十年战争中获得许多欧陆领土，使其跃升成为欧洲强国。
description.en: In the 17th century, Sweden gained many continental territories in the Thirty Years' War, which elevated it to the status of a European great power.

description.zh-cn: 从1150年代起，瑞典占领芬兰，芬兰成为瑞典本土一部分，直到1809年芬兰战争后被割让给俄国。
description.en: From the 1150s, Sweden occupied Finland, and Finland became part of Sweden proper until it was ceded to Russia after the Finnish War in 1809.

description.zh-cn: 根据基尔条约，丹麦被迫将挪威割让给瑞典，从而失去了对挪威的统治。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Kiel, Denmark was forced to cede Norway to Sweden, thereby losing its rule over Norway.
